issue.title: [CI] Upgrade windows runner version as windows-2016 is deprecated.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16308](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16308). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
"The windows-2016 environment is deprecated and will be removed on April 1st, 2022"

So we need to upgrade all runners to at least windows-2019 (or 2022/latest ?)
